price: 63. (Abraham) contestó (con ironía): «No, ha sido este, el mayor de todos. Preguntadles a ellos, si es que pueden hablar».
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal faʿalahu kabīruhum hādhā fasalūhum in kānū yanṭiqūna
